name: Alex Lee
tech: basic knowledge of real estate apps and software
dreams_and_goals: Buying his first home and achieving financial independence
Finding a home that fits his lifestyle and reflects his personal style
Building equity and investing in his future
pain_points_and_challenges: Navigating the home buying process for the first time and feeling overwhelmed by the options and information
Balancing his desire for a desirable location with his limited budget
Concerns about unexpected maintenance or repair costs
